mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT sessionNum,TO_CHAR(sessionDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') sessionDate,cs.concertNum ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition by sessionDate order by sessionDate) cnt FROM concertSession cs JOIN concert c on cs.concertNum=c.concertNum ) WHERE cnt=1 AND concertNum=#{concertNum} AND sessionDate > #{today} ORDER BY sessionDate ASC, concertNum DESC

SELECT sl.seatLevel,sc.seatCount,sl.color,sessionNum,c.hallNum FROM seatLevel sl JOIN seatCount sc ON sl.seatLevelNum=sc.seatLevelNum JOIN concert c ON sc.hallNum=c.hallNum JOIN concertSession cs ON cs.concertNum=c.concertNum WHERE sessionNum=#{sessionNum} ORDER BY seatCount desc
SELECT hallNum FROM concertSession cs JOIN concert c ON cs.concertNum=c.concertNum WHERE sessionNum=#{sessionNum}

SELECT ch.hallNum, sp.seatLevelNum, sp.seatPrice FROM seatPrice sp JOIN concert c ON c.concertNum=sp.concertNum JOIN concertHall ch ON ch.hallNum=c.hallNum WHERE ch.hallNum=#{hallNum} ORDER BY seatLevelNum ASC
